item.description:
Lets meet at the General Ticket Boot (Located Behind Sleep Stalkers Attraction) at 6:00 PM

About Spooky World / Nightmare New England
The legendary SpookyWorld & Nightmare New England return to deliver one of the largest, most terrifying Halloween Scream Parks in the country!

Over 100,000 Sq. ft of terror awaits you at New England's number one destination for Halloween thrills this October.
The massive 20-acre Scream Park features SEVEN heart-racing haunted attractions at ONE monstrous location. Dozens of freakish characters stalk the grounds and roam freely in the woods lining the property. The Monster Midway hosts live music, go-karts (voted #1 in NH!), batting cages, two themed mini-golf courses, concessions, restaurant, bar, photo opportunities, gifts and more!

The variety and scale of Nightmare New England and SpookyWorld offers something for even the boldest of Halloween fanatics. Leave it to us to make your Halloween an unforgettable experience.

For detailed information visit,
http://www.spookyworl...
http://www.nightmaren...


Where:
Spooky World
454 Charles Bancroft Highway
Litchfield, N.H. 03052


When:
October 10, 2010, 6PM
Lets meet at the General Ticket Boot (Located Behind Sleep Stalkers Attraction) at 6:00 PM
My phone no, is (617) 299-6099 in case you need.
Please try not to be late.


Cost:General Admission $29.99
I have coupon that will take of $5 from the regular admission. Also if you buy online you can get $7 off if you text 1031 to 70259

Car Pool Information:
If anyone needs a ride or will be interested in Car Pooling, we can meet at Davis Square at 4:30 PM, outside of ABP (Au Bon Pain, 18-48 Holland St., Somerville 02144) . Please let me know if you need a ride, or you will be interested in driving. I can take 4 people with me.

Please email us your suggestions, comments and concerns at feedback@inquisitiveminds.org
item.how_to_find_us: Lets meet at the General Ticket Boot (Located Behind Sleep Stalkers Attraction) at 6:00 PM My phone no, is (617) 299-6099 in case you need.
item.name: Spooky World / Nightmare New England
